Hexo `git``nodejs``hexo``MyBlog``cd``git bash` `E:\MyBlog` `Git Bash Here``git``git``Windows``cmd` `npm install -g hexo-cli``Hexo` ```bash npm install -g hexo-cli ``` `hexo -v` `hexo` `hexo`,`hexo init` ```bash hexo init MyBlog ``` `MyBlog` - `node_modules`: - `public` - `scaffolds` - `source` - `themes`** - `_config.yml`: ** `hexo g``hexo s` ```bash hexo g hexo s ``` ![](https://s1.ax1x.com/2020/03/12/8VdlGD.png) ### 5. SSHGitHub `SSH``GitHub``Github` `git bash here` ```bash git config --global user.name "GitHub" git config --global user.email "GitHub" ``` ```bash git config user.name git config user.email ``` `SSH`, ```bash ssh-keygen -t rsa -C "GitHub" ``` `.ssh``git bash` ```bash cat ~/.ssh/id_rsa.pub ``` `github``settings``SSH and GPG keys``SSH``id_rsa.pub` ![](https://s1.ax1x.com/2020/03/12/8Vwnyj.png) `git bash``ssh -T git@github.com` ```bash ssh -T git@github.com ``` ### 7. hexoGitHub `hexo``GitHub``_config.yml` ```bash deploy: type: git repository: https://github.com/LuckyZmj/LuckyZmj.github.io branch: master ``` `repository``github``git` `deploy-git` ,`GitHub` ```bash npm install hexo-deployer-git --save ``` `github``http://yourname.github.io` ```bash hexo clean hexo generate hexo deploy ``` `hexo clean` `hexo generate` `hexo g` `hexo deploy``hexo d` >`deploy``username``password` ### 8. `git bash here``npm i hexo-deployer-git` ```bash npm i hexo-deployer-git ``` `hexo new post "article title"` ```bash hexo new post "article title" ``` `E:\MyBlog\source\_posts``.md` ```markdown``markdown` ![](https://s1.ax1x.com/2020/03/12/8VwItf.png) `markdown``hexo g``hexo s``hexo d``github``github.io` `Hexo` ## 0x004 Hexo --- ### 1. 0x002 Fires

1. JS 

<script>
function fire() { 
   $.each($(".particletext.fire"), function(){ 
      var firecount = ($(this).width()/50)*20; 
      for(var i = 0; i <= firecount; i++) { 
         var size = $.rnd(8,12); 
         $(this).append('<span class="particle" style="top:' + $.rnd(40,70) + '%; left:' + $.rnd(-10,100) + '%;width:' + size + 'px; height:' + size + 'px;animation-delay: ' + ($.rnd(0,20)/10) + 's;"></span>'); 
      } 
   }); 
} 
  jQuery.rnd = function(m,n) {
      m = parseInt(m);
      n = parseInt(n);
      return Math.floor( Math.random() * (n - m + 1) ) + m;
  }
  fire();
</script>

2. CSS

}
.confetti > .particle.c2 {
  background-color: rgba(156, 39, 176, 0.5);
}
@-webkit-keyframes confetti {
  0% {
    opacity: 0;
    -webkit-transform: translateY(0%) rotate(0deg);
            transform: translateY(0%) rotate(0deg);
  }
  10% {
    opacity: 1;
  }
  35% {
    -webkit-transform: translateY(-800%) rotate(270deg);
            transform: translateY(-800%) rotate(270deg);
  }
  80% {
    opacity: 1;
  }
  100% {
    opacity: 0;
    -webkit-transform: translateY(2000%) rotate(1440deg);
            transform: translateY(2000%) rotate(1440deg);
  }
}
@keyframes confetti {
  0% {
    opacity: 0;
    -webkit-transform: translateY(0%) rotate(0deg);
            transform: translateY(0%) rotate(0deg);
  }
  10% {
    opacity: 1;
  }
  35% {
    -webkit-transform: translateY(-800%) rotate(270deg);
            transform: translateY(-800%) rotate(270deg);
  }
  80% {
    opacity: 1;
  }
  100% {
    opacity: 0;
    -webkit-transform: translateY(2000%) rotate(1440deg);
            transform: translateY(2000%) rotate(1440deg);
  }
}
</style>

3. HTML 

<div style="width: 100%;text-align: center; height: 120px; position: relative; bottom: 0px;" > 
<span class="particletext confetti" style="font-size:48px; position: relative;">This is confetti</span>
</div>

0x007 Sunbeams

1. JS 

<script>
function sunbeams() { 
   $.each($(".particletext.sunbeams"), function(){ 
      var linecount = ($(this).width()/50)*10; 
      for(var i = 0; i <= linecount; i++) { 
         $(this).append('<span class="particle" style="top:' + $.rnd(-50,00) + '%; left:' + $.rnd(0,100) + '%;width:' + $.rnd(1,3) + 'px; height:' + $.rnd(80,160) + '%;animation-delay: -' + ($.rnd(0,30)/10) + 's;"></span>'); 
      } 
   }); 
} 
  jQuery.rnd = function(m,n) {
      m = parseInt(m);
      n = parseInt(n);
      return Math.floor( Math.random() * (n - m + 1) ) + m;
  }
  sunbeams();
</script>

2. CSS 

<style>
.sunbeams > .particle {
  position: absolute;
  background-color: rgba(253, 216, 53, 0.5);
  -webkit-animation: sunbeams 3s linear infinite;
          animation: sunbeams 3s linear infinite;
}
@-webkit-keyframes sunbeams {
  0% {
    -webkit-transform: translateY(40%) rotate(0deg);
            transform: translateY(40%) rotate(0deg);
  }
  50% {
    -webkit-transform: translateY(-40%) rotate(180deg);
            transform: translateY(-40%) rotate(180deg);
  }
  100% {
    -webkit-transform: translateY(40%) rotate(360deg);
            transform: translateY(40%) rotate(360deg);
  }
  0%,14%,17%,43%,53%,71%,80%,94%,100% {
    opacity: 0;
  }
  6%,15%,24%,28%,48%,55%,78%,82%,99% {
    opacity: 1;
  }
}
@keyframes sunbeams {
  0% {
    -webkit-transform: translateY(40%) rotate(0deg);
            transform: translateY(40%) rotate(0deg);
  }
  50% {
    -webkit-transform: translateY(-40%) rotate(180deg);
            transform: translateY(-40%) rotate(180deg);
  }
  100% {
    -webkit-transform: translateY(40%) rotate(360deg);
            transform: translateY(40%) rotate(360deg);
  }
  0%,14%,17%,43%,53%,71%,80%,94%,100% {
    opacity: 0;
  }
  6%,15%,24%,28%,48%,55%,78%,82%,99% {
    opacity: 1;
  }
}
</style>

3. HTML

Hexo

## 

---

- Windows 10 
- ECSCentOS7.x

## 

---

### 

**1.Git**

git.exe,Download git,`Use Git from the Windows Command Prompt`
- Git[](https://git-scm.com/download)
- Git[](https://www.liaoxuefeng.com/wiki/896043488029600)


**2.Nodejs**

[Node.js](http://nodejs.cn/download/)`.exe``Win+R`cmd`node -v``npm -v`

npm

```bash
npm config set registry https://registry.npm.taobao.org
```

**4.Hexo**

`MyBlog``cd``git bash here`

`npm install -g hexo-cli``Hexo`

```bash
npm install -g hexo-cli
```

`hexo -v`,


`hexo`,`hexo init`

```bash
hexo init MyBlog
```

`MyBlog`

- `node_modules`: 
- `public`
- `scaffolds`
- `source`
- `themes`**
- `_config.yml`: **

`hexo g``hexo s`

```bash
hexo g
hexo s
```

![Hexo](https://s1.ax1x.com/2020/03/12/8VdlGD.png)

### ssh

`Git Bash Here`Git`,

```bash
ssh-keygen -t rsa
```

`.ssh``git bash`

```bash
cat ~/.ssh/id_rsa.pub
```



### 

`Git`

```bash
yum install git
```

`Git`

```bash
adduser git
```



```bash
chmod 740 /etc/sudoers
vim /etc/sudoers
```



```bash
## Allow root to run any commands anywhere
root    ALL=(ALL)     ALL
```



```bash
git   ALL=(ALL)     ALL
```



```bash
chmod 400 /etc/sudoers
```

`git`

```bash
sudo passwd git
```

`git` `~/.ssh`  `~/.ssh/authorized_keys` 

```bash
su git
mkdir ~/.ssh
vim ~/.ssh/authorized_keys
# win10id_rsa.pubauthorized_keys
chmod 600 /home/git/.ssh/authorized_keys
chmod 700 /home/git/.ssh
```

`Git``git``SERVER``IP``yes`

```bash
ssh -v git@SERVER
```



```bash
#repoGit
mkdir /var/repo
chown -R git:git /var/repo
chmod -R 755 /var/repo
#hexo
mkdir /var/www/hexo
chown -R git:git /var/www/hexo
chmod -R 755 /var/www/hexo
```

 `Git` 

```bash
cd var/repo
git init --bare hexoBlog.git
```


 `Git`   `/var/repo/hexoBlog.git`  `hooks`  `post-receive`

```bash
vim /var/repo/hexoBlog.git/hooks/post-receive
```


 `i` ) `Git`  `Git` 

```bash
#!/bin/bash
git --work-tree=/var/www/hexo --git-dir=/var/repo/hexoBlog.git checkout -f
```

 `Esc` `:wq` 



```bash
chown -R git:git /var/repo/hexoBlog.git/hooks/post-receive
chmod +x /var/repo/hexoBlog.git/hooks/post-receive
```

 `Git` 

### Nginx

Nginx `Linux`6.0(`Centos7.x`5.9)

```bash
yum install -y wget && wget -O install.sh http://download.bt.cn/install/install_6.0.sh && bash install.sh
```


`Linux`6.0

```bash
curl http://download.bt.cn/install/update6.sh|bash
```

`Nginx`

--(`IP`)-`PHP`- 

-

```bash
server
{
    listen 80;
  # server_name 
    server_name luckyzmj.cn blog.luckyzmj.cn;
    index index.php index.html index.htm default.php default.htm default.html;
  # root/var/www/hexo
    root /var/www/hexo;
```

-

-`/var/www/hexo` 



```bash
service bt restart
```

### Hexo

`Hexo``MyBlog`,`Git Bash Here`

```bash
#()
git config --global user.email "you@example.com"
#()
git config --global user.name "Your Name"
```

`_config.yml`, 

`Hexo``MyBlog``_config.yml`, `deploy`

```bash
deploy:
  type: git
  #serverIP
  #repo: git@luckyzmj.cn:/var/repo/blog.git
  repo: git@server:/var/repo/blog.git
  branch: master
```



`Hexo``MyBlog`,`Git Bash Here`

```bash
hexo clean 
hexo g -d
```

`ip``Hexo` 

Github

>### 

 hexo d`git``git` 

```bash
chown -R git:git /var/repo/
```

`repo``git` 

```bash
chown -R git:git /var/www/hexo
```
